info.name: Scenic Neon YouTube
info.description: Transform your YouTube experience with the "Scenic Neon YouTube" style. This custom theme integrates a breathtaking scenic background image, setting a serene and immersive atmosphere. The design features a modern dark mode with semi-transparent content areas, allowing the background to subtly shine through while maintaining focus on the content. Neon accents in green and blue highlight titles, buttons, and links, adding a vibrant and dynamic flair. Rounded corners and soft shadow effects enhance video thumbnails, while subtle hover animations make interactions smooth and engaging. Elevate your YouTube interface with this unique blend of nature's beauty and modern design elements
